oldask: Usage: oldask [6characters] #ask what is the emoji character
purpose:
This module is to transform Chinese word to 小篆 and store as emoji on Slack
Author : linnil1
Source : https://github.com/linnil1/slack_emoji_bot
There are 5 operations : ["old","oldask","oldreact","oldset","oldhelp"]
oldhelp: Usage: oldhelp (func...) #get help for the usage of this modle or the function
old: Usage: old [text] #transfer text to 小篆emoji.
oldset: Usage: oldset [aWord] [newName] #set alias for 小篆emoji
oldreact: Usage: oldreact [text] #give the previous message reactions of 小篆emoji
